explains: adj. （价格、要求等）过分的，离谱的

sentences.en: Exorbitant housing prices have created an acute shortage of affordable housing for the poor.
sentences.cn: 过高的房价使穷人负担得起的房源严重短缺。

sentences.en: The exorbitant cost of our health-insurance benefits reflects the high dollar amount of medical expenses incurred by our employees.
sentences.cn: 我们医疗保险福利的高昂费用反映了我们员工的高额医疗费用。

sentences.en: But prices in London are exorbitant.
sentences.cn: 但是在伦敦的价格确实过高了。
